definition: nickname of the FAST radio telescope (in Guizhou)
eye/small hole/crux (of a matter)/CL:隻|只[zhi1],雙|双[shuang1]/classifier for big hollow things (wells, stoves, pots etc)

sentences.english: There is a dog of his head there is a lot like Erlang's eye in the sky.
sentences.chinese: 小狗有一個他的頭上有一個很像二郎神的天眼。

sentences.english: Another rare gift is the Inner Eye, the ability to prophesy.
sentences.chinese: 天眼是另一項罕見的天賦，這項天賦用於預言。

sentences.english: Yelu Arhat's disciples had sharp heaven eyes.
sentences.chinese: 耶律尊者的弟子天眼銳利。

sentences.english: But I think I do not need to know it.
sentences.chinese: 政治人物不需要開天眼，但他一定要懂得常識。

sentences.english: You will benefit in many ways if you decide to awaken your third eye chakra.
sentences.chinese: 如果你決定喚醒天眼查克拉你將多處收益。

sentences.english: You are the inner city duke it, I would like to ask some questions?
sentences.chinese: 你是天眼城的城主嗎，我想詢問一些問題？

definition: mystery known only to heaven (archaic)/inscrutable twist of fate/fig. top secret
Qixing district of Guilin city 桂林市[Gui4 lin2 shi4], Guangxi
Tianxin district of Changsha city 長沙市|长沙市[Chang2 sha1 shi4], Hunan
center of the sky/will of heaven/will of the Gods/the monarch's will
the real body (of Buddha or a God)/true effigy
meteorological or astronomical phenomenon (e.g. rainbow or eclipse)
Great Bear/Big Dipper/Peitou town in Changhua county 彰化縣|彰化县[Zhang1 hua4 xian4], Taiwan
